summary:
So I just woke up not to long ago so thought I’d share my dream before I forget it.
Alright so I had a dream that I went to this...
body:
So I just woke up not to long ago so thought I’d share my dream before I forget it.

Alright so I had a dream that I went to this event of some sort and I sat at this table to eat and dan was sitting right across from me and I didn’t even tell him I knew who he was and we had a good normal conversation and then suddenly asked him when is album is coming out? and he mumbled “only Phil knows” and then I woke up 🤣 oh also in the dream he took my cookie and I was pissed🤣

reblog.comment:

summary: do you want to play a game?
body:
do you want to play a game?

Here’s how it works:

  1. choose any Dan and Phil video (gaming vids probably work best, but it could be any)
  2. pause it at any random moment
  3. reblog this post with the inevitable hilarious derp and which video it’s from

Let the game begin!

21 | Demi-Pan | INFJ | Center-Left Economist |||
sometimes I respond to posts with moderately contradictory opinions in the hopes that my readers practice viewing both sides of an argument... I believe understanding the causes of awful things, rather than dismissing them immediately as awful, is a good skill to have. anyway, good to meet you, hope you like the cats on my blog
